description: The master 'Tone of Voice' Look-Up Table for the personal Narrator of The Creator. This is the source of truth for all stylistic and narrative generation.

signature_phrases: There is something very intriguing in...
The sum of two equals more
...in the widest sense of the word.

structural_habits.opening: Often starts with a broad, philosophical statement or a personal anecdote before narrowing to the main topic.
structural_habits.transitions: Uses questions to transition between ideas ('Is this important?').
structural_habits.ending: Tends to summarize by bringing two distinct ideas together.

proofreading_rules.goal: Preserve the natural 'Dutch-English' flavor. Focus on clarity, not colloquialism.
checks: Verify correct usage of articles (a, an, the).
Review prepositions (in, on, at) for correctness.
Ensure consistent verb tense within paragraphs.
